pull.title: wallet: add codex32 argument to addhdkey
pull.body:
Rebase of #27351 onto #29136.

WIP

This PR introduces the ability to import [BIP 93/codex32](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0093.mediawiki) master seeds with the `addhdkey` command. It currently expects seeds to be provided in  either as a single seed or as a list of shares which can be assembled via Shamir Secret Sharing.

events.message:
descriptor: Add unused(KEY) descriptor

unused() descriptors do not have scriptPubKeys. Instead, the wallet uses
them to store keys without having any scripts to watch for.
test: Simple test for importing unused(KEY)

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#bitcoin-core/gui/872](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/872) (Menu action to export a watchonly wallet by achow101)
* [#33392](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33392) (wallet, rpc: add UTXO set check and incremental rescan to importdescriptors by musaHaruna)
* [#33135](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33135) (wallet: warn against accidental unsafe older() import by Sjors)
* [#33008](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33008) (wallet: support bip388 policy with external signer by Sjors)
* [#32861](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/32861) (Have createwalletdescriptor auto-detect an unused(KEY) by Sjors)
* [#32489](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/32489) (wallet: Add `exportwatchonlywallet` RPC to export a watchonly version of a wallet by achow101)
* [#30243](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30243) (descriptors: taproot partial descriptors by Eunovo)
* [#29136](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29136) (wallet: `addhdkey` RPC to add just keys to wallets via new `unused(KEY)` descriptor by achow101)
* [#28690](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28690) (build: Introduce internal kernel library by TheCharlatan)
* [#28333](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28333) (wallet: Construct ScriptPubKeyMans with all data rather than loaded progressively by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

events.message: wallet, rpc: Disallow import of unused() if key already exists
wallet, rpc: Disallow importing unused() to wallets without privkeys

events.body:
Concept ACK-ish

This is certainly better than the previous approach.

events.message: Hack importdescriptors to look for private keys in the wallet

bech32: expose the character conversion functionality

In the next commit we will implement a new checksum, codex32, which uses
the same encoding and HRP rules as bech32 and bech32m, but has a
substantially different checksum verification procedure. To minimize
duplicated code, we expose the character conversion in a new
bech32::internals module.
codex32: introduce Lagrange interpolation and derived shares
